cn.description:
我的足迹MyTracks是一款通过使用GPS数据来记录您的位置的应用程序。它非常适合徒步旅行、慢跑、散步、骑行等各种活动。这款应用程序利用先进的技术提供精确的测量和计算。

以下是您可以使用MyTracks做的事情：
记录您的路线：无论您是徒步旅行、慢跑还是骑行，MyTracks都可以记录您的路径并在地图上显示。
保存收藏的位置：如果有特定的地点您想要记住，您可以将它们标记为应用程序中的收藏夹。
导入和导出数据：MyTracks允许您以多种格式导入和导出数据，如CSV、GPX、KML和KMZ。
提高准确性：您可以进行静态GPS观测，以获得更准确的路标。
轻松导航：该应用程序在指南针上提供路标指南，让您轻松导航到特定位置。
可定制的路标：您可以手动添加路标，也可以从您的收藏位置导入。您甚至可以添加具有角度和距离的矢量。
坐标转换：MyTracks允许您随时在四种不同的坐标格式（十进制、度分秒、MGRS、UTM）之间进行转换。
其他功能：该应用程序在记录过程中显示滑翔比，提供度数或千分度的指南针选项，支持地图上的MGRS网格叠加，并允许您在开始跟踪之前创建路线。
详细记录：您可以在地图上查看您的轨迹并重播路线。该应用程序提供有关您的轨迹的详细统计信息，并显示与每个轨迹相关联的已保存路标。您还可以更改轨迹的颜色以便更容易识别。

请注意，持续在后台使用GPS会快速消耗设备的电池。如果您喜欢我们的应用，请分享好友给予我们支持！如果您有任何反馈或问题，请随时通过miaozhi.ai@gmail.com与我们联系。

cn.description:
请订阅PlanItPhoto微信公众号，查看更多的精彩文章和教程。我们的另外有个免费应用巧摄现场版也已经发布。

免费中文视频教学：
YouTube：
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbfOTOEQhi3klBpHP952Y9je
哔哩哔哩：
https://space.bilibili.com/382927099/channel/seriesdetail?sid=2490499


另外我们还有20个小时的收费直播课。欢迎订阅我们的微信公众号了解更多信息。

也许您正在寻找一个这样的应用，可以帮助您计划风光摄影的各种细节。那恭喜您，真的不用再找了，巧摄专业版就是梦寐以求的应用。不管您喜欢风光摄影的哪个方面，旅行，城市，自然，夜景，星空，银河，星轨，延时，这个应用都可以帮助到您。

著名美国摄影师安塞尔•亚当斯在他的第一本书《Taos Pueblo》强调了“可视化”的概念。他提出“预可视化”，也就是说摄影师应该在按下快门之前就想像出最后出来的照片会使怎样。当然，很多伟大的照片是即兴拍摄出来的，但是对于风光摄影师来说，如果可以提前预见到场景的样子会很大程度上避免因为没有准备好而错失良机，也会大大增加出好片的机会。

现在科技发达，摄影师可以使用很多不同的工具实现场景的预可视化。当然，手机应用就是很多这样的工具之一，而且越来越流行。我们这个巧摄专业版就是这样的一个全功能的应用。它巧妙地利用地图结合各种摄影工具和日月银河星历功能，来实现场景预可视化。

在这个看似简单的应用里面，我们加了很多的功能。比如说任何地点的GPS坐标、海拔高度、两点距离、海拔高度差、以及从某一点是否可以看到某个景点。这些信息不单对摄影师，可能对很多热爱旅游的人来说，都是重要的。而对摄影师，我们还专门提供了焦距（水平方向和垂直方向），景深、超焦距和全景工具。不仅如此，我们还加入了星历表的功能。这样您就可以查到任何一天任何地点的日出日落时间、月出月落时间、曙暮光开始结束时间、黄金时段、蓝色时段。甚至任何时刻的太阳和月亮的位置你都可以查到。还有星星、星座、银河、星云的位置。另外还有星轨计算器和延时摄影计算器功能，曝光自动计算，ND滤镜计算器，光度计，彩虹位置预测，部分国家的潮汐数据。可以说是风光摄影需要的功能，应有尽有。和其它类似应用不同的是我们这个应用把上面提到的所有功能都在地图上或者取景框方式下直观地显示出来，各个功能之间还可以结合使用。

风光摄影是我们对自然界的探险。 我们知道您在外面探索时，可能会没有任何网络。 巧摄专业版当然知道这个，所以只要您预装离线海拔文件和离线mbtiles地图，您可以完全离线使用该应用程序，而无需网络连接。

许可协议：https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
隐私声明：https://planitphoto.cn/privacy.html

新增中国风DLC——大圣游记
修复了 iOS 17 及更早版本的问题。
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===

比以往任何时候都更具威胁和力量，王国保卫战5 带来了一种全新、令人兴奋的体验，以其前作的快节奏和引人入胜的玩法为基础，赢得了奖项的赞誉。

当一个强大的邪恶势力在王国上空出现时，一个意想不到的联盟形成了——发动终极塔防战役，用两支军队中最精锐的力量来保卫整个王国和领域！虽然他们暂时并肩作战，但临时联盟内部典型的纷争可能会改变后续冒险的走向。

准备好释放双英雄的强大力量，在塔防战斗中扭转战局吧！
没错，现在你可以同时控制两条龙！双倍的喷火乐趣，双倍的混乱——只要确保他们不会因为谁能囤积更多的金子争吵！

所有重量级角色如圣骑士、弓箭手、法师、死灵法师等等都听你指挥。但要注意，他们可能会开始争论谁是队伍中的真正英雄，而敌人却悄悄溜过去！ 
你准备好迎接终极对决了吗？和利尼维亚的勇敢战士们以及不屈不挠的黑暗军团，踏上征服一个巨大敌人的史诗旅程。  

游戏特色：
招募34名独特的英雄和防御塔！

- 18个精英防御塔的建造和升级
骑士顶在最前方、弓箭手百步穿杨、法师的奥术魔法、死灵法师的亡灵之力，甚至还有能召唤恶魔的深渊祭坛！——这些经典强力塔都将听从你的号令！

- 16个史诗英雄 - 将塔防战斗提升到新的水平
同时控制2名英雄去战斗！
准备见证最不可能的双英雄组合的强大威力！森林守护灵搭配钢铁傀儡？
时空法师携手“普通勇士”？看似离奇的搭档，也能爆发惊人威力！

- 6种不同地形，更有迷人的战场等你征服
保卫Kingdom Rush的多彩景观。穿越王国深林，甚至其危险的洞穴作战。

- 25个充满快节奏塔防战斗的战役阶段
在充满惊喜挑战和细节的异国地形中设定你的策略。
面对成群的不可预测的敌人和史诗般的boss战斗，将你的防御策略推向极限！

- 3种不同的游戏模式来测试你的实力
在取得胜利后，尝试以更具挑战性的方式玩每个阶段。谁不喜欢一个好的挑战呢？

- 58多个游戏成就在战斗中征服
没有诱人的奖励，史诗策略游戏算什么？展示你的技能，解锁奖励！

- 45种以上不同的敌人来测试你的塔防智慧
展现联盟的塔防战斗技能，对抗4个不同的敌人氏族。用独特的防御策略击败他们每一个！

- 当然…
有很多复活节彩蛋和Ironhide Game Studio一贯的轻松幽默。
因为没有一些隐藏的惊喜，策略游戏算什么呢？


--------

Ironhide隐私政策：https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy

hk.description:
*線上合作模式現已開放：分享代碼給好友，一起冒險吧！*

《Children of Morta》是一款以故事為主軸的動作 RPG，結合了 Roguelite 的角色成長特色。在遊戲中，玩家將操控的不僅僅是一位角色，而是一個非凡的英雄家族。

在隨機生成的地牢、洞穴和土地中砍殺成群的敵人，帶領擁有各自優缺點的柏格森家族對抗即將來臨的腐化。故事發生在遙遠的世界，卻觸及我們每個人都熟悉的情感與主題：愛與希望，渴望與不安，失落……以及為了拯救最重要的人所願意付出的犧牲。
這是一個關於英雄家族團結一致，對抗侵襲黑暗的動人故事。

-- 完全版 --

《Ancient Spirits》和《Paws and Claws》DLC 都包含在主遊戲中並可在遊戲過程中解鎖。

特色
- 歡迎加入家族！與英雄般的柏格森家族一起面對挑戰，傳承家族榮耀，拯救瑞亞之地免受腐化侵襲
- 同心協力：在這款 Roguelite RPG 中，每次冒險都能提升整個家族的技能和裝備，讓他們變得更強
- 團結力量大：在七位可操控角色間自由切換，每位角色都有獨特的能力、戰鬥風格和迷人的個性
- 沉浸於瑞亞美麗又致命的世界中，精美的 2D 像素藝術結合手工動畫和現代光影技術，帶來視覺享受
- 家族並肩作戰：利用雙人線上合作模式，在每場戰鬥中並肩作戰（此功能將在發佈後更新推出）

精心為手機重新設計
- 全新介面設計——專為手機打造的專屬 UI，完全支援觸控操作
- 支援 Game Center 成就系統
- 雲端存檔——在 iOS 裝置間共享遊戲進度
- 支援 MFi 控制器
- iPhone 15 最佳化（包括 Pro Max）

hk.description:
在這個快節奏的動作rogue-lite遊戲《孤骨勇士》中，失去頭顱反而是戰鬥的一部分。

遊戲擁有100位獨特能力的可操控角色，配合眾多道具，可創造出既瘋狂又具挑戰性的戰鬥。
魔王城廢墟
人類對魔王城的攻擊歷史悠久，此次卻與眾不同。
這次不僅冒險家加入戰鬥，還有帝國軍隊和被稱為「卡倫之英雄」的領袖共同發動全面攻擊，決心一舉根絕魔族。
他們以壓倒性的人數攻陷了魔族堡壘，並成功將其徹底摧毀。城堡中的所有魔族都被俘虜，唯獨一個名叫「孤骨」的孤獨骷髏逃脫了。
黑暗鏡子模式
完成主線故事後，挑戰自我極限，試試全新的「黑暗鏡子」模式吧！

遊戲特色
- 在這場魔族的絕望之中，你是最後的希望！化身為小小骷髏「孤骨」，踏上旅程去擊敗狂妄的英雄們，解救被卡倫墮落軍隊俘虜的魔王。
- 換上新的孤骨，感受失去頭顱的痛快：借用前任擁有者的力量和華服，搭配獨特的道具來創造連鎖技能，戰勝敵人。
- 不死不休：在這款動作滿載的rogue-lite平台遊戲中，你將迎接一切挑戰，直至最終。
- 觀賞充滿活力、風格卡通的像素藝術2D動畫，幫助各種魔族生物恢復本來面目。
- 從埃及的木乃伊到希臘的牛頭怪，甚至《Dead Cells》的官方跨界合作……你能找到遊戲中所有有趣的彩蛋嗎？

專為移動裝置精心重新設計
- 改進的介面——獨家手機用戶介面，完整的觸控操作
- Game Center 成就
- 雲端儲存——在 iOS 裝置間共享你的進度
- 支援 MFi 控制器
- 兼容 iPhone 15（包括 Pro Max）

hk.description:
我的足跡MyTracks是一個使用GPS數據來追蹤您位置的應用程式。它非常適合各種活動，如徒步旅行、慢跑、散步、騎自行車等等。這款應用程式利用先進的技術提供精確的測量和計算。

以下是您可以使用MyTracks進行的操作：
追蹤您的路線：無論是徒步旅行、慢跑還是騎行，MyTracks都能夠記錄您的路徑並在地圖上顯示。
保存喜愛的位置：如果有特定地點您想要記住，您可以在應用程式中將其標記為喜愛的位置。
匯入和匯出數據：MyTracks允許您以CSV、GPX、KML和KMZ等多種格式匯入和匯出數據。
提高準確性：您可以進行靜態GPS觀測，以獲得更準確的路標。
輕鬆導航：該應用程式在指南針上提供路標導航，讓您輕鬆導航到指定位置。
可自訂的路標：您可以手動添加路標，或從喜愛的位置中導入路標。您甚至可以添加具有角度和距離的向量。
座標轉換：MyTracks允許您隨時在四種不同座標格式（十進制、度分秒、MGRS、UTM）之間進行轉換。
其他功能：該應用程式在錄製過程中顯示滑翔比，提供度數或千分度的指南針選項，支援地圖上的MGRS網格疊加，並允許您在開始追蹤之前創建路線。
詳細記錄：您可以在地圖上查看您的追蹤軌跡並重播路線。該應用程式提供有關您的軌跡的詳細統計信息，並顯示與每個追蹤相關的已保存路標。您還可以更改追蹤的顏色以便更容易識別。

請注意，持續在背景使用GPS會快速耗盡設備的電池。如果您喜歡我們的應用，請分享好友給予我們支持！如果您有任何回饋或問題，請隨時透過miaozhi.ai@gmail.com與我們聯繫。

hk.trackName: Planit巧攝專業版：风光攝影計劃神器
hk.releaseNotes:
修復了副標題不顯示相機高度、目標高度等數值的問題。
修復了初次安裝無法雙指推地圖讓其傾斜的問題。
修復了iOS 26的標記編譯頁面開關的顯示問題。
hk.description:
請訂閱PlanItPhoto微信公衆號，檢視更多的精彩文章和教程。我們的另外有個免費應用巧攝現場版也已經發布。

44集免費中文視頻教學：
YouTube:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbfOTOEQhi3klBpHP952Y9je
嗶哩嗶哩：
https://space.bilibili.com/382927099/channel/seriesdetail?sid=2490499

另外我們還有20個小時的收費直播課。歡迎訂閱我們的微信公衆號瞭解更多資訊。

也許您正在尋找一個這樣的應用，可以說明您計劃風光攝影的各種細節。那恭喜您，真的不用再找了，巧攝專業版就是夢寐以求的應用。不管您喜歡風光攝影的哪個方面，旅遊，城市，自然，夜景，星空，銀河，星軌，縮時，這個應用都可以說明到您。

著名美國攝影師安塞爾•亞當斯在他的第一本書《Taos Pueblo》強調了“可視化”的概念。他提出“預可視化”，也就是說攝影師應該在按下快門之前就想像出最後出來的照片會使怎樣。當然，很多偉大的照片是即興拍攝出來的，但是對於風光攝影師來說，如果可以提前預見到場景的樣子會很大程度上避免因爲沒有準備好而錯失良機，也會大大增加出好片的機會。

現在科技發達，攝影師可以使用很多不同的工具實現場景的預可視化。當然，手機應用就是很多這樣的工具之一，而且越來越流行。我們這個巧攝專業版就是這樣的一個全功能的應用。它巧妙地利用地圖結合各種攝影工具和日月銀河星曆功能，來實現場景預可視化。

在這個看似簡單的應用裏面，我們加了很多的功能。比如說任何地點的GPS座標、海拔高度、兩點距離、海拔高度差、以及從某一點是否可以看到某個景點。這些資訊不單對攝影師，可能對很多熱愛旅遊的人來說，都是重要的。而對攝影師，我們還專門提供了焦距（水平方向和垂直方向），景深、超焦距和全景工具。不僅如此，我們還加入了星曆錶的功能。這樣您就可以查到任何一天任何地點的日出日落時間、月出月落時間、曙暮光開始結束時間、黃金時段、藍色時段。甚至任何時刻的太陽和月亮的位置你都可以查到。還有星星、星座、銀河、星雲的位置。另外還有星軌計算器和縮時攝影計算器功能，曝光自動計算，ND濾鏡計算器，光度計，彩虹位置預測，部分國家的潮汐資料。可以說是風光攝影需要的功能，應有盡有。和其它類似應用不同的是我們這個應用把上面提到的所有功能都在地圖上或者取景框方式下直觀地顯示出來，各個功能之間還可以結合使用。

風光攝影是我們對自然界的探險。 我們知道您在外面探索時，可能會沒有任何網路。 巧攝專業版當然知道這個，所以只要您預裝離線海拔檔案和離線mbtiles地圖，您可以完全離線使用該應用程式，而無需網路連接。

許可協議：https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
隱私聲明：https://planitphoto.cn/privacy.html

mo.description:
*線上合作模式現已開放：分享代碼給好友，一起冒險吧！*

《Children of Morta》是一款以故事為主軸的動作 RPG，結合了 Roguelite 的角色成長特色。在遊戲中，玩家將操控的不僅僅是一位角色，而是一個非凡的英雄家族。

在隨機生成的地牢、洞穴和土地中砍殺成群的敵人，帶領擁有各自優缺點的柏格森家族對抗即將來臨的腐化。故事發生在遙遠的世界，卻觸及我們每個人都熟悉的情感與主題：愛與希望，渴望與不安，失落……以及為了拯救最重要的人所願意付出的犧牲。
這是一個關於英雄家族團結一致，對抗侵襲黑暗的動人故事。

-- 完全版 --

《Ancient Spirits》和《Paws and Claws》DLC 都包含在主遊戲中並可在遊戲過程中解鎖。

特色
- 歡迎加入家族！與英雄般的柏格森家族一起面對挑戰，傳承家族榮耀，拯救瑞亞之地免受腐化侵襲
- 同心協力：在這款 Roguelite RPG 中，每次冒險都能提升整個家族的技能和裝備，讓他們變得更強
- 團結力量大：在七位可操控角色間自由切換，每位角色都有獨特的能力、戰鬥風格和迷人的個性
- 沉浸於瑞亞美麗又致命的世界中，精美的 2D 像素藝術結合手工動畫和現代光影技術，帶來視覺享受
- 家族並肩作戰：利用雙人線上合作模式，在每場戰鬥中並肩作戰（此功能將在發佈後更新推出）

精心為手機重新設計
- 全新介面設計——專為手機打造的專屬 UI，完全支援觸控操作
- 支援 Game Center 成就系統
- 雲端存檔——在 iOS 裝置間共享遊戲進度
- 支援 MFi 控制器
- iPhone 15 最佳化（包括 Pro Max）

advisories: 頻繁/極度的暴力卡通或幻想
偶爾/輕度的恐怖或驚嚇題材
mo.releaseNotes: Thanks for playing! We’ve made some performance improvements and added a security fix.
mo.description:
在這個快節奏的動作rogue-lite遊戲《孤骨勇士》中，失去頭顱反而是戰鬥的一部分。

遊戲擁有100位獨特能力的可操控角色，配合眾多道具，可創造出既瘋狂又具挑戰性的戰鬥。
魔王城廢墟
人類對魔王城的攻擊歷史悠久，此次卻與眾不同。
這次不僅冒險家加入戰鬥，還有帝國軍隊和被稱為「卡倫之英雄」的領袖共同發動全面攻擊，決心一舉根絕魔族。
他們以壓倒性的人數攻陷了魔族堡壘，並成功將其徹底摧毀。城堡中的所有魔族都被俘虜，唯獨一個名叫「孤骨」的孤獨骷髏逃脫了。
黑暗鏡子模式
完成主線故事後，挑戰自我極限，試試全新的「黑暗鏡子」模式吧！

遊戲特色
- 在這場魔族的絕望之中，你是最後的希望！化身為小小骷髏「孤骨」，踏上旅程去擊敗狂妄的英雄們，解救被卡倫墮落軍隊俘虜的魔王。
- 換上新的孤骨，感受失去頭顱的痛快：借用前任擁有者的力量和華服，搭配獨特的道具來創造連鎖技能，戰勝敵人。
- 不死不休：在這款動作滿載的rogue-lite平台遊戲中，你將迎接一切挑戰，直至最終。
- 觀賞充滿活力、風格卡通的像素藝術2D動畫，幫助各種魔族生物恢復本來面目。
- 從埃及的木乃伊到希臘的牛頭怪，甚至《Dead Cells》的官方跨界合作……你能找到遊戲中所有有趣的彩蛋嗎？

專為移動裝置精心重新設計
- 改進的介面——獨家手機用戶介面，完整的觸控操作
- Game Center 成就
- 雲端儲存——在 iOS 裝置間共享你的進度
- 支援 MFi 控制器
- 兼容 iPhone 15（包括 Pro Max）

Celebrating the release of Evoland 2, with minor fixes and improving overall performance. Thank you for playing Evoland!
mo.description:
在你進行遊戲時，你將解鎖新技術、遊戲系統以及更加進步的圖像。從黑白到全3D圖像、回合制到即時頭目戰鬥。Evoland讓你體驗冒險遊戲的不斷進化，這一切都透過許多幽默及經典遊戲瞬間所達成。

- 遊玩動作冒險類遊戲歷史之旅
- 發現許多改變，從老派的2D動作/冒險到啟用實時戰鬥和全3D動作。
- 重新造訪以全3D渲染的初始區域，或用自己的飛船探索地表世界！
- 享受地下城、謎題和一系列待揭發的秘密，還有數以百計的成就和星星可供收集。

前次更新內容 
- 增加了西班牙文/中文/韓文本地化文字
- 增加了 GameCenter 服務。
- 錯誤修正

mo.releaseNotes: 新增黑色主題，歡迎使用！
mo.description:
我的足跡MyTracks是一個使用GPS數據來追蹤您位置的應用程式。它非常適合各種活動，如徒步旅行、慢跑、散步、騎自行車等等。這款應用程式利用先進的技術提供精確的測量和計算。

以下是您可以使用MyTracks進行的操作：
追蹤您的路線：無論是徒步旅行、慢跑還是騎行，MyTracks都能夠記錄您的路徑並在地圖上顯示。
保存喜愛的位置：如果有特定地點您想要記住，您可以在應用程式中將其標記為喜愛的位置。
匯入和匯出數據：MyTracks允許您以CSV、GPX、KML和KMZ等多種格式匯入和匯出數據。
提高準確性：您可以進行靜態GPS觀測，以獲得更準確的路標。
輕鬆導航：該應用程式在指南針上提供路標導航，讓您輕鬆導航到指定位置。
可自訂的路標：您可以手動添加路標，或從喜愛的位置中導入路標。您甚至可以添加具有角度和距離的向量。
座標轉換：MyTracks允許您隨時在四種不同座標格式（十進制、度分秒、MGRS、UTM）之間進行轉換。
其他功能：該應用程式在錄製過程中顯示滑翔比，提供度數或千分度的指南針選項，支援地圖上的MGRS網格疊加，並允許您在開始追蹤之前創建路線。
詳細記錄：您可以在地圖上查看您的追蹤軌跡並重播路線。該應用程式提供有關您的軌跡的詳細統計信息，並顯示與每個追蹤相關的已保存路標。您還可以更改追蹤的顏色以便更容易識別。

請注意，持續在背景使用GPS會快速耗盡設備的電池。如果您喜歡我們的應用，請分享好友給予我們支持！如果您有任何回饋或問題，請隨時透過miaozhi.ai@gmail.com與我們聯繫。

tw.description:
在這個快節奏的動作rogue-lite遊戲《孤骨勇士》中，失去頭顱反而是戰鬥的一部分。

遊戲擁有100位獨特能力的可操控角色，配合眾多道具，可創造出既瘋狂又具挑戰性的戰鬥。
魔王城廢墟
人類對魔王城的攻擊歷史悠久，此次卻與眾不同。
這次不僅冒險家加入戰鬥，還有帝國軍隊和被稱為「卡倫之英雄」的領袖共同發動全面攻擊，決心一舉根絕魔族。
他們以壓倒性的人數攻陷了魔族堡壘，並成功將其徹底摧毀。城堡中的所有魔族都被俘虜，唯獨一個名叫「孤骨」的孤獨骷髏逃脫了。
黑暗鏡子模式

遊戲特色

- 換上新的孤骨，感受失去頭顱的痛快：借用前任擁有者的力量和華服，搭配獨特的道具來創造連鎖技能，戰勝敵人。

- 從埃及的木乃伊到希臘的牛頭怪，甚至《Dead Cells》的官方跨界合作……你能找到遊戲中所有有趣的彩蛋嗎？

tw.description:
我的足跡MyTracks是一個使用GPS數據來追蹤您位置的應用程式。它非常適合各種活動，如徒步旅行、慢跑、散步、騎自行車等等。這款應用程式利用先進的技術提供精確的測量和計算。

以下是您可以使用MyTracks進行的操作：
追蹤您的路線：無論是徒步旅行、慢跑還是騎行，MyTracks都能夠記錄您的路徑並在地圖上顯示。
保存喜愛的位置：如果有特定地點您想要記住，您可以在應用程式中將其標記為喜愛的位置。
匯入和匯出數據：MyTracks允許您以CSV、GPX、KML和KMZ等多種格式匯入和匯出數據。
提高準確性：您可以進行靜態GPS觀測，以獲得更準確的路標。
輕鬆導航：該應用程式在指南針上提供路標導航，讓您輕鬆導航到指定位置。
可自訂的路標：您可以手動添加路標，或從喜愛的位置中導入路標。您甚至可以添加具有角度和距離的向量。
座標轉換：MyTracks允許您隨時在四種不同座標格式（十進制、度分秒、MGRS、UTM）之間進行轉換。
其他功能：該應用程式在錄製過程中顯示滑翔比，提供度數或千分度的指南針選項，支援地圖上的MGRS網格疊加，並允許您在開始追蹤之前創建路線。
詳細記錄：您可以在地圖上查看您的追蹤軌跡並重播路線。該應用程式提供有關您的軌跡的詳細統計信息，並顯示與每個追蹤相關的已保存路標。您還可以更改追蹤的顏色以便更容易識別。

請注意，持續在背景使用GPS會快速耗盡設備的電池。如果您喜歡我們的應用，請分享好友給予我們支持！如果您有任何回饋或問題，請隨時透過miaozhi.ai@gmail.com與我們聯繫。

tw.description:
請訂閱PlanItPhoto微信公衆號，檢視更多的精彩文章和教程。我們的另外有個免費應用巧攝現場版也已經發布。

44集免費中文視頻教學：
YouTube:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbfOTOEQhi3klBpHP952Y9je
嗶哩嗶哩：
https://space.bilibili.com/382927099/channel/seriesdetail?sid=2490499

另外我們還有20個小時的收費直播課。歡迎訂閱我們的微信公衆號瞭解更多資訊。

也許您正在尋找一個這樣的應用，可以說明您計劃風光攝影的各種細節。那恭喜您，真的不用再找了，巧攝專業版就是夢寐以求的應用。不管您喜歡風光攝影的哪個方面，旅遊，城市，自然，夜景，星空，銀河，星軌，縮時，這個應用都可以說明到您。

著名美國攝影師安塞爾•亞當斯在他的第一本書《Taos Pueblo》強調了“可視化”的概念。他提出“預可視化”，也就是說攝影師應該在按下快門之前就想像出最後出來的照片會使怎樣。當然，很多偉大的照片是即興拍攝出來的，但是對於風光攝影師來說，如果可以提前預見到場景的樣子會很大程度上避免因爲沒有準備好而錯失良機，也會大大增加出好片的機會。

現在科技發達，攝影師可以使用很多不同的工具實現場景的預可視化。當然，手機應用就是很多這樣的工具之一，而且越來越流行。我們這個巧攝專業版就是這樣的一個全功能的應用。它巧妙地利用地圖結合各種攝影工具和日月銀河星曆功能，來實現場景預可視化。

在這個看似簡單的應用裏面，我們加了很多的功能。比如說任何地點的GPS座標、海拔高度、兩點距離、海拔高度差、以及從某一點是否可以看到某個景點。這些資訊不單對攝影師，可能對很多熱愛旅遊的人來說，都是重要的。而對攝影師，我們還專門提供了焦距（水平方向和垂直方向），景深、超焦距和全景工具。不僅如此，我們還加入了星曆錶的功能。這樣您就可以查到任何一天任何地點的日出日落時間、月出月落時間、曙暮光開始結束時間、黃金時段、藍色時段。甚至任何時刻的太陽和月亮的位置你都可以查到。還有星星、星座、銀河、星雲的位置。另外還有星軌計算器和縮時攝影計算器功能，曝光自動計算，ND濾鏡計算器，光度計，彩虹位置預測，部分國家的潮汐資料。可以說是風光攝影需要的功能，應有盡有。和其它類似應用不同的是我們這個應用把上面提到的所有功能都在地圖上或者取景框方式下直觀地顯示出來，各個功能之間還可以結合使用。

風光攝影是我們對自然界的探險。 我們知道您在外面探索時，可能會沒有任何網路。 巧攝專業版當然知道這個，所以只要您預裝離線海拔檔案和離線mbtiles地圖，您可以完全離線使用該應用程式，而無需網路連接。

許可協議：https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
隱私聲明：https://planitphoto.cn/privacy.html

us.description:
MyTracks is an app that helps you keep track of your location using GPS data. It's perfect for various activities like hiking, running, walking, biking, and more. This app uses advanced technology to provide precise measurements and calculations.

Here's what you can do with MyTracks:
- Track your route: Whether you're hiking, running, or cycling, MyTracks can record your path and show it on a map.
- Save favorite locations: If there are specific places you want to remember, you can mark them as favorites in the app.
- Import and export data: MyTracks allows you to import and export data in various formats such as CSV, GPX, KML, and KMZ.
- Improve accuracy: You can take static GPS observations to get more accurate waypoints for your tracks.
- Easy navigation: The app provides a waypoint guide on the compass, making it easy for you to navigate to specific locations.
- Customizable waypoints: You can add waypoints manually or import them from your favorite locations. You can even add vectors with angle and distance.
- Coordinate conversion: MyTracks allows you to convert between four different coordinate formats (Decimal, DMS, MGRS, UTM) at any time.
- Additional features: The app displays glide ratio during recording, offers compass options in degrees or mils, supports MGRS Grid overlay on the map, and allows you to create routes to follow before starting your track.
- Detailed records: You can view your tracks on a map and replay the route. The app provides detailed statistics about your track and displays the saved waypoints associated with each track. You can also change the color of your tracks for easier identification.

Please note that using GPS continuously in the background can drain your device's battery quickly. If you have any feedback or questions, please feel free to contact us at miaozhi.ai@gmail.com

Children of Morta is a story-driven action RPG with a roguelite approach to character development, in which you don’t play a single character but a whole, extraordinary family of heroes. 

Hack’n’slash through hordes of enemies in procedurally generated dungeons, caves and lands and lead the Bergson family, with all their flaws and virtues, against the forthcoming Corruption. The story takes place in a distant land but copes with themes and emotions common to all of us: love and hope, longing and uncertainty, ultimately loss... and sacrifice we are willing to make to save the ones we care the most for. 
Ultimately, it's about a family of heroes standing together against the encroaching darkness.

-- Complete Edition --

Both the Ancient Spirits and the Paws and Claws DLC are included in the main game and available as you play.

FEATURES
- Welcome to the family! Join the heroic Bergsons in their trials to honor their heritage and save the land of Rea from the creeping Corruption 
- One for all, all for one: improve skills and gear for the whole family through each run in the ever-changing world of this roguelite RPG
- Stronger together: switch between 7 playable characters, each with their own abilities, fighting styles and endearing personality 
- Immerse yourself in the beautiful, deadly world of Rea through gorgeous 2D pixel art mixing handcrafted animations with modern lighting techniques
- Family that slays together stays together: use the two-player online coop mode and rely on each other in every fight (available in a post-launch update)

- Game Center achievements

- iPhone 15 Optimization (including Pro Max)

us.description:
Skul is a fast-paced action rogue-lite where losing your head is encouraged. 

Featuring 100 playable characters each with their own unique abilities and a ton of items that can create wild synergies, the battles are as electrifying as they are challenging.

The Demon King's Castle in Ruins
The human race attacking the Demon King's castle is nothing new and has happened countless times before.
What makes this time different though, is that the Adventurers decided to join forces with the Imperial Army and the 'Hero of Caerleon' to lead a full onslaught in hopes of wiping out the Demons once and for all. 
They attacked the Demon stronghold with overwhelming numbers and succeeded in its total destruction. All of the demons in the castle were taken prisoner except for one lone skeleton named 'Skul'.

Dark Mirror Mode
Once you're through with the main story, test your skills and limits in the new challenging 'Dark Mirror' mode!

FEATURES
-You’re the last hope of the entire demon race! Play as Skul, a tiny skeleton on a path to slay the pompous heroes and save the demon king from the corrupt army of Carleon.  
-Losing your head never felt so right: try on new skulls to borrow the powers and dashing outfits of their previous owners and create synergies with unique items to defeat your enemies.
-What is dead may never die: you will not rest until you have faced all the challenges of this action-packed rogue-lite platformer.
-Let your hollow eyes feast upon vibrant, cartoony pixel-art 2D animations as you help all sorts of demonic creatures return to their original state.
-From the Mummies of Egypt to the Minotaur of Greece or even an official Dead Cells crossover… Will you spot all the fun easter eggs scattered across the game?

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface – exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control
- Game Center achievements
- Cloud Save – Share your progress between iOS devices
- Compatible with MFi controllers
- iPhone 15 Optimization (including Pro Max)

請參考在PalReader 網站上的使用錄像來深入了解此應用程序.
閱讀程序具有以下先進功能:

專為iPhone 而做的存儲優化, 存儲相同的圖書比其它程序節省超過30%的空間.
全屏幕閱讀支持. LoudReader 只在用戶需要時顯示控制對話框, 而其它iPhone 閱讀程序顯示控制始終佔用寶貴的屏幕.

頁內捲動控制幫助讀者在長頁面內快速移動到任意位置.

雙擊頁面即可彈出控制面板. 閱讀器的操作由這一個彈出式控制面板控制, 簡單直觀方便易用.
如希望快速在頁面內移動, 可用控制面板小滾輪選擇頁面位置百分比.
輕擊綠色的箭頭控制章節導航的後退和前進.
退出閱讀器時程序會自動記住最後的閱讀位置(甚至包括上次卷滾條位置), 下次進入閱讀器時程序直接打開到此處.

us.description:
Please email info@planitphoto.com for bug reports or feature requests. Please also remember to visit https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbcn1Fd1NRWTOczTY1RYEug4 for more video tutorials. Each video only lasts a few minutes but you will surely learn a lot from them. You can also reach us through Instagram. Links are under the menu inside the app.

This is a special call to landscape photographers, travel photographers, nature photographers, and those who are interested in night photography, city photography, time-lapse, star-trails, milky way or astrophotography: look no more, this is the ultimate app for you - the Planit Pro. It only costs you a cup of Frappuccino but will save you tons of time and effort and a lot of gas money. Most importantly, it will make you enjoy landscape photography even more.

Ansel Adams dedicates the beginning of his first book "Taos Pueblo" to visualization. He introduced the idea of "previsualization", which involved the photographer imagining what he wanted his final print to look like before he even took the photo. Of course, there are many great photos that were taken impromptu. However, for landscape photographers, being able to previsualize the scene before going there will greatly reduce the chance of being caught unprepared and will greatly increase the chance of getting better photos.

Photographers use various tools to help them pre-visualizing the scene. Nowadays, many of those tools are phone apps. Planit Pro is an all-in-one solution that is designed to leverage the map and simulated viewfinder technologies to provide the necessary tools for photographers to pre-visualize the scene in combination with the ground subjects and the celestial objects such as the Sun, the Moon, Stars, Star-trails and Milky Way.

In the Planit Pro app, we packed it with features - from location scouting such as GPS coordinates, elevations, distance, elevation gain, clear view, focal length, depth of field (DoF), hyperfocal distance, panorama, and aerial photography, to the Ephemeris features such as the sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset time and direction, twilight time, special hours of the day, sun/moon finder, major stars, constellations, nebulae azimuth and elevation angle, star trail planning, time-lapse calculation and simulation, sequence calculation and simulation, milky way searching, solar eclipse and lunar eclipse, exposure/ND filter calculator, light meter, rainbow position prediction, tide height, and tide search, etc. All the information is either represented on the map as an overlay or visually presented in simulated viewfinders (VR, AR, picture, or street view), just like you look through your camera's viewfinder. Whatever you want for your landscape photography, it is there in the Planit Pro.

Landscape photography is an adventure in the natural world. We understand that sometimes there won't be any network connection when you are out exploring. Planit Pro was designed for having it in mind. If you preload the offline elevation files and the offline mbtiles maps, you can use the app fully offline without the need for network connections.

tr.description:
MyTracks is an app that helps you keep track of your location using GPS data. It's perfect for various activities like hiking, running, walking, biking, and more. This app uses advanced technology to provide precise measurements and calculations.

Here's what you can do with MyTracks:
- Track your route: Whether you're hiking, running, or cycling, MyTracks can record your path and show it on a map.
- Save favorite locations: If there are specific places you want to remember, you can mark them as favorites in the app.
- Import and export data: MyTracks allows you to import and export data in various formats such as CSV, GPX, KML, and KMZ.
- Improve accuracy: You can take static GPS observations to get more accurate waypoints for your tracks.
- Easy navigation: The app provides a waypoint guide on the compass, making it easy for you to navigate to specific locations.
- Customizable waypoints: You can add waypoints manually or import them from your favorite locations. You can even add vectors with angle and distance.
- Coordinate conversion: MyTracks allows you to convert between four different coordinate formats (Decimal, DMS, MGRS, UTM) at any time.
- Additional features: The app displays glide ratio during recording, offers compass options in degrees or mils, supports MGRS Grid overlay on the map, and allows you to create routes to follow before starting your track.
- Detailed records: You can view your tracks on a map and replay the route. The app provides detailed statistics about your track and displays the saved waypoints associated with each track. You can also change the color of your tracks for easier identification.

Please note that using GPS continuously in the background can drain your device's battery quickly. If you have any feedback or questions, please feel free to contact us at miaozhi.ai@gmail.com

tr.description:
*Online co-op is now available: play with a friend by sharing a code!*

Children of Morta is a story-driven action RPG with a roguelite approach to character development, in which you don’t play a single character but a whole, extraordinary family of heroes. 

Hack’n’slash through hordes of enemies in procedurally generated dungeons, caves and lands and lead the Bergson family, with all their flaws and virtues, against the forthcoming Corruption. The story takes place in a distant land but copes with themes and emotions common to all of us: love and hope, longing and uncertainty, ultimately loss... and sacrifice we are willing to make to save the ones we care the most for. 
Ultimately, it's about a family of heroes standing together against the encroaching darkness.

-- Complete Edition --

Both the Ancient Spirits and the Paws and Claws DLC are included in the main game and available as you play.

FEATURES
- Welcome to the family! Join the heroic Bergsons in their trials to honor their heritage and save the land of Rea from the creeping Corruption 
- One for all, all for one: improve skills and gear for the whole family through each run in the ever-changing world of this roguelite RPG
- Stronger together: switch between 7 playable characters, each with their own abilities, fighting styles and endearing personality 
- Immerse yourself in the beautiful, deadly world of Rea through gorgeous 2D pixel art mixing handcrafted animations with modern lighting techniques
- Family that slays together stays together: use the two-player online coop mode and rely on each other in every fight (available in a post-launch update)

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface – exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control
- Game Center achievements
- Cloud Save – Share your progress between iOS devices
- Compatible with MFi controllers
- iPhone 15 Optimization (including Pro Max)

tr.description:
Skul is a fast-paced action rogue-lite where losing your head is encouraged. 

Featuring 100 playable characters each with their own unique abilities and a ton of items that can create wild synergies, the battles are as electrifying as they are challenging.

The Demon King's Castle in Ruins
The human race attacking the Demon King's castle is nothing new and has happened countless times before.
What makes this time different though, is that the Adventurers decided to join forces with the Imperial Army and the 'Hero of Caerleon' to lead a full onslaught in hopes of wiping out the Demons once and for all. 
They attacked the Demon stronghold with overwhelming numbers and succeeded in its total destruction. All of the demons in the castle were taken prisoner except for one lone skeleton named 'Skul'.

Dark Mirror Mode
Once you're through with the main story, test your skills and limits in the new challenging 'Dark Mirror' mode!

FEATURES
-You’re the last hope of the entire demon race! Play as Skul, a tiny skeleton on a path to slay the pompous heroes and save the demon king from the corrupt army of Carleon.  
-Losing your head never felt so right: try on new skulls to borrow the powers and dashing outfits of their previous owners and create synergies with unique items to defeat your enemies.
-What is dead may never die: you will not rest until you have faced all the challenges of this action-packed rogue-lite platformer.
-Let your hollow eyes feast upon vibrant, cartoony pixel-art 2D animations as you help all sorts of demonic creatures return to their original state.
-From the Mummies of Egypt to the Minotaur of Greece or even an official Dead Cells crossover… Will you spot all the fun easter eggs scattered across the game?

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
- Revamped interface – exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control
- Game Center achievements
- Cloud Save – Share your progress between iOS devices
- Compatible with MFi controllers
- iPhone 15 Optimization (including Pro Max)

tr.description:
From legendary game creator Hideo Kojima comes a genre-defying experience, now expanded in this definitive DIRECTOR’S CUT. 
 
In the future, a mysterious event known as the Death Stranding has opened a doorway between the living and the dead, leading to grotesque creatures from the afterlife roaming the fallen world marred by a desolate society. 
 
As Sam Bridges, your mission is to deliver hope to humanity by connecting the last survivors of a decimated America. 
 Can you reunite the shattered world, one step at a time?

DEATH STRANDING DIRECTOR'S CUT on iOS includes a HIGH FRAME RATE, PHOTO MODE, and cross-over content from Valve Corporation's HALF-LIFE series and CD Projekt Red's Cyberpunk 2077. Stay connected with players around the globe with the Social Strand System™.

Mac and iOS
• Sign-in to iCloud and activation of iCloudDrive are required to play this product.
• This product can be played offline, but a network connection is required to fully experience the Social Strand System™. Communication fees will be incurred during online play.

Only for iOS version
• When playing this product for the first time, you will be required to download additional data. You can start the game once you have downloaded approximately 13 GB, but additional downloads will occur as the game progresses, requiring a total of approximately 50 GB of downloads. Additional downloads will occur when additional language voice data is used.

FAQs

tr.description:
Please email info@planitphoto.com for bug reports or feature requests. Please also remember to visit https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbcn1Fd1NRWTOczTY1RYEug4 for more video tutorials. Each video only lasts a few minutes but you will surely learn a lot from them. You can also reach us through Instagram. Links are under the menu inside the app.

This is a special call to landscape photographers, travel photographers, nature photographers, and those who are interested in night photography, city photography, time-lapse, star-trails, milky way or astrophotography: look no more, this is the ultimate app for you - the Planit Pro. It only costs you a cup of Frappuccino but will save you tons of time and effort and a lot of gas money. Most importantly, it will make you enjoy landscape photography even more.

Ansel Adams dedicates the beginning of his first book "Taos Pueblo" to visualization. He introduced the idea of "previsualization", which involved the photographer imagining what he wanted his final print to look like before he even took the photo. Of course, there are many great photos that were taken impromptu. However, for landscape photographers, being able to previsualize the scene before going there will greatly reduce the chance of being caught unprepared and will greatly increase the chance of getting better photos.

Photographers use various tools to help them pre-visualizing the scene. Nowadays, many of those tools are phone apps. Planit Pro is an all-in-one solution that is designed to leverage the map and simulated viewfinder technologies to provide the necessary tools for photographers to pre-visualize the scene in combination with the ground subjects and the celestial objects such as the Sun, the Moon, Stars, Star-trails and Milky Way.

In the Planit Pro app, we packed it with features - from location scouting such as GPS coordinates, elevations, distance, elevation gain, clear view, focal length, depth of field (DoF), hyperfocal distance, panorama, and aerial photography, to the Ephemeris features such as the sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset time and direction, twilight time, special hours of the day, sun/moon finder, major stars, constellations, nebulae azimuth and elevation angle, star trail planning, time-lapse calculation and simulation, sequence calculation and simulation, milky way searching, solar eclipse and lunar eclipse, exposure/ND filter calculator, light meter, rainbow position prediction, tide height, and tide search, etc. All the information is either represented on the map as an overlay or visually presented in simulated viewfinders (VR, AR, picture, or street view), just like you look through your camera's viewfinder. Whatever you want for your landscape photography, it is there in the Planit Pro.

Landscape photography is an adventure in the natural world. We understand that sometimes there won't be any network connection when you are out exploring. Planit Pro was designed for having it in mind. If you preload the offline elevation files and the offline mbtiles maps, you can use the app fully offline without the need for network connections.

License agreement at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy at https://planitphoto.com/privacy.html

pt.description:
*O cooperativo on-line já está disponível: compartilhe um código e jogue com um amigo!*

Children of Morta é um RPG de ação baseado em história, com uma abordagem roguelite ao desenvolvimento de personagens, no qual você não joga com um único personagem, mas com uma família inteira e extraordinária de heróis.

Derrote hordas de inimigos em masmorras, cavernas e terras geradas processualmente e lidere a família Bergson, com todas as suas falhas e virtudes, contra a corrupção que se aproxima. A história se passa em uma terra distante, mas lida com temas e emoções comuns a todos nós: amor e esperança, saudade e incerteza, perda... e o sacrifício que estamos dispostos a fazer para salvar quem mais amamos.
No fim, trata-se de uma família de heróis unida contra a escuridão iminente.

-- Edição Completa --

Tanto o DLC Ancient Spirits quanto o Paws and Claws estão incluídos no jogo principal e disponíveis conforme você joga.

CARACTERÍSTICAS
- Boas-vindas à família! Junte-se aos heroicos Bergsons em provações para honrar sua herança e salvar a terra de Rea da crescente corrupção
- Um por todos e todos por um! Melhore as habilidades e os equipamentos de toda a família a cada partida no mundo em constante mudança deste RPG roguelite
- A união faz a força! Alterne entre 7 personagens jogáveis, cada um com as próprias habilidades, estilos de luta e personalidade cativante
- Mergulhe no belo e mortal mundo de Rea feito em pixel art 2D, misturando animações feitas à mão com técnicas modernas de iluminação
- Família que mata unida permanece unida: use o modo cooperativo on-line para dois jogadores e confiem um no outro em todas as lutas (disponível em uma atualização pós-lançamento)

CUIDADOSAMENTE REPROJETADO PARA DISPOSITIVOS MÓVEIS
- Interface renovada – interface exclusiva para dispositivos móveis com controle sensível ao toque completo
- Conquistas do Game Center
- Armazenamento na nuvem – compartilhe o progresso entre dispositivos iOS
- Compatível com controles MFi
- Otimizado para iPhone 15 (incluindo Pro Max)

pt.description:
Skul é um roguelite de ação em ritmo acelerado, onde incentiva-se a perder a cabeça.

Com 100 personagens jogáveis, cada um com as próprias habilidades exclusivas e muitos itens que podem criar sinergias incríveis, as batalhas são tão eletrizantes quanto desafiadoras.

O Castelo do Rei Demônio em ruínas
O ataque da raça humana ao castelo do Rei Demônio não é novidade e já aconteceu inúmeras vezes.
Desta vez, o que difere é que os aventureiros decidiram unir forças com o Exército Imperial e escolheram o “Herói de Caerleon” para liderar um ataque total na esperança de exterminar os demônios de uma vez por todas.
Eles atacaram a fortaleza do Demônio com números esmagadores e conseguiram destruí-lo totalmente. Todos os demônios do castelo viraram prisioneiros, exceto um esqueleto solitário chamado “Skul”.

Modo Espelho Sombrio
Ao terminar a história principal, teste suas habilidades e seus limites no novo e desafiador modo “Espelho Sombrio”!

CARACTERÍSTICAS
- Você é a última esperança de toda a raça demoníaca! Jogue como Skul, um esqueletinho no caminho para matar os heróis pomposos e salvar o rei demônio do exército corrupto de Caerleon.
- Perder a cabeça nunca foi tão certo: experimente crânios novos para pegar emprestado os poderes e as roupas elegantes dos donos anteriores e crie sinergias com itens exclusivos para derrotar os inimigos.
- O que está morto não pode morrer: você não descansará até enfrentar todos os desafios deste jogo de plataforma roguelite cheio de ação.
- Deixe seus olhos vazios deleitarem-se com animações 2D vibrantes de pixel art enquanto você ajuda todos os tipos de criaturas demoníacas a retornar ao estado original.
- Das múmias do Egito ao Minotauro da Grécia, ou até mesmo um crossover oficial de Dead Cells… Será que você consegue encontrar todos os easter eggs divertidos espalhados pelo jogo?

CUIDADOSAMENTE REPROJETADO PARA DISPOSITIVOS MÓVEIS
- Interface renovada – IU exclusiva para dispositivos móveis com controle de toque completo
- Conquistas do Game Center
- Armazenamento na nuvem – Compartilhe o progresso entre dispositivos iOS
- Compatível com controles MFi
- Otimização do iPhone 15 (incluindo Pro Max)

Earthquake Network is the most comprehensive app on earthquakes and for most world countries it is the only earthquake early warning system for receiving real time alerts.

Earthquake Network gives you:

- Real time alerts if you live close to the epicentre
- Alerts seconds in advances if you live far from the epicentre
- Real time user reports on felt earthquakes
- Free earthquake data from 21 seismic networks including U.S., Puerto Rico, India, Indonesia, Turkey, Mexico, Chile, Peru, Ecuador, Argentina, Venezuela, Dominican Republic, Colombia, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, China, New Zeland, Japan, Italy, Croatia, Spain and Greece

The Earthquake Network research project (https://www.sismo.app) aims at developing a smartphone-based earthquake early warning system able to detect earthquakes in real time and to alert the population in advance. Smartphones are able to detect earthquakes thanks to the accelerometer on-board each device. When an earthquake is detected, users with the application installed are immediatly alerted. Since earthquake waves travel at around 5 km/s it is possible to alert the population not yet reached by the damaging waves of the earthquake. For the scientific details about the project please refer to the scientific paper on Frontiers at https://bit.ly/2C8B5HI

Subscriptions:

When an earthquake is detected in real time by smartphones near the epicenter, the server sends an alert to all users with the app. Alerting all users can take up to 10 seconds since it is not technically feasible to do so instantly. Now you can join the priority lists of the first 10,000 or 100,000 people alerted in real time. The following subscriptions are available:

- Subscription 10k for 1 year
- Subscription 10k for 1 month 

- Subscription 100k for 1 year
- Subscription 100k for 1 month 

• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Privacy: https://www.sismo.app/privacy

Terms and conditions: https://www.sismo.app/terms-conditions
